slider.desc:
Present new business opportunities, find new customers, 
recommend some qualified leads that result in new contracts and earn commissions and remuneration.
slider.agente_desc:
Sales Agents represent Angola Cables in customer relations, qualify leads, develop relationships, 
follow up on sales growth, and close deals on behalf of Angola Cables in local markets. 
Training, education, and support for sales and local channel management will be provided.
slider.revendedor_desc:
Manage your clients and sales contracts autonomously, with access to a stock of products at special negotiated discounts. 
The partnership guarantees Angola Cables' infrastructure and technical support, allowing competitive negotiations in your markets.
alcance_mercados: Together, we will reach markets and promote our network in transmission, Internet, and ICT solutions across Brazil, the USA, Latin America (LATAM), Europe, Africa, and the Middle East.
oportunidade_perfeita: Our program is the perfect opportunity for telecommunications companies, operators, and internet service providers looking to grow in business volume and expand their reach.
programa_parceiros: The Angola Cables Group Partner Program was created to support the growth of our partners and help them succeed with the best connectivity and interconnection solutions. . Our commitment is to offer continuous support, high-level resources and a collaborative environment, helping to boost your business.
operadora_conectada_mundo: 21st most connected operator in the world
descricao_beneficios: By taking advantage of Angola Cables' robust infrastructure and connectivity solutions, participants can unlock new business opportunities, improve service delivery and establish a stronger presence in global markets.
indicador_negocios_descricao:
Business Referral Partners can present qualified business opportunities that lead to new contracts with Angola Cables.

The partner registers the lead and forwards the opportunity to the Angola Cables or TelCables sales team.

If the process is well-informed, processed in the AC system, and validated, you may receive commissions or referral fees in the event of success.
agente_vendas_descricao:
Authorized Sales Agents are indirect commercial partners and approved to act in the market on behalf of Angola Cables or TelCables.

These partners play an active role in qulaifying leads, building relationships, identifying opportunities, and finalising deals.

To be approved as Sales Agents, partners need to complete training and obtain certifications in Angola Cables' main solutions and products.
revendedor_descricao:
Angola Cables' Resellers contract directly with their customers and operate under a master agreement with Angola Cables or TelCables subsidiaries.

These partners have full control of their customer portfolio, product stock, sales process and relationships with customers and the market.

Exclusive advantages for resellers: Access to discounted rates on transmission, internet, colocation and ICT circuits, allowing them to define their own margins.

Exclusive advantages for Resellers: Access to discounted rates for rack space, transport circuits and IP transit, allowing you to define your own margins.
partner_program_description: By joining the Angola Cables Partner Programme, your company will have access to advanced connectivity solutions, modern infrastructure and specialised support to strengthen services, optimise operations and boost revenues.
programa_parceiros_descricao: By joining the Angola Cables Partner Programme, your company will have access to advanced connectivity solutions, modern infrastructure and specialised support to strengthen services, optimise operations and boost revenues.
circuito_descricao: Resilient, low-latency connectivity solutions (EPLC and IPLC) connecting Africa, Europe, Brazil, the USA, Data Centres and Exchange Points.
remote_peering_descricao: Allows you to establish peering without physical presence, using Angola Cables as a remote provider to connect to 6,000 peering agreements at more than 27 Internet Exchange Points worldwide.
gdi_descricao: Direct connection to the main international data centres, providing easy access to all the companies present in these data centres through cross connect.
dia_descricao: The solution offers secure access to global CDNs and Tier 1s without an ASN, connecting 27 IXPs strategically.
ip_transito_descricao: Benefit from local and international routing options for Tier 1 networks, CDNs and major IXPs.
ip_gamer_descricao: Local and international connectivity with CDNs, Tier 1 ISPs and IXPs, guaranteeing high performance and robust access.
ip_exchange_descricao: Exchange traffic with more than 27 IXPs in Africa, Europe, Brazil and the USA via a single connection.
angonap_descricao: We provide high-level infrastructure in our datacentres in Angola and Brazil, with security, expansion capacity and energy redundancy, guaranteeing continuous hosting and connectivity services.
managed_services_descricao: Specialised support in routing, switching, security, VoIP and infrastructure, with an Angola Cables team managing the network, reducing errors and labour costs.
clouds2africa_descricao: Advanced database storage, processing and management services, guaranteeing security, agility, cost optimisation and maximised performance.
clouds2brasil_descricao: Advanced database storage, processing and management services, guaranteeing security, agility, cost optimisation and maximised performance.
backup2africa_descricao: Secure cloud storage with fast recovery, minimizing risks and ensuring business continuity.
backup2brasil_descricao: Secure cloud storage with fast recovery, minimizing risks and ensuring business continuity.
acloud_connect_descricao: Cloud solution that improves performance, productivity and reduces costs, accessible from any Internet-enabled device.
shields2africa_descricao: Shields2Africa is a robust and customised solution from Angola Cables, designed to effectively protect any content or company against cyber attacks.
shields2brasil_descricao: Shields2Africa is a robust and customised solution from Angola Cables, designed to effectively protect any content or company against cyber attacks.
sd_wan_descricao: Optimises the network with multiple connections (MPLS, LTE, Internet), security with SSL inspection and centralised management, reducing costs and increasing security and efficiency.
atendimento_personalizado_descricao: Angola Cables is a multinational company with offices in more than 7 cities, 5 countries and 200 employees from various backgrounds and cultures. We have a network that covers the 4 continents of the Atlantic. Angola Cables is today a company prepared for the challenges of digitalisation with the infrastructure and human talent to operate in any market.
